content.name: Remote Access to Safe Deposit Storage and Pilot's Inventories
content.author: Chem O`Dun
content.description: The player HQ is equipped with a Safe Deposit Storage, which is accessible by default only when Player is docked at the HQ. This mod allows the Player to access the Safe Deposit Storage (and Pilot's Inventories) remotely. Distance is based on result of researching the individual Teleportation range.
